name: dubtrack.fm - Rainbow progress bars and sliders
description: Subtle accents to make dubtrack.fm look even more fun.
additional_info: Introduction As with most other things I do, what initially started life as something fun became exponentially a little bit more, until it became a completed project. This style will add a pseudochild to the footer, of which content is moved to be on top of it. A twelve-colour smooth rainbow gradient with the original footer colour is used for this by default. Use notes Speed of animation can be adjusted in animation constants; Smaller is faster. Background position in animation types needs to match background size in animation size and type; Bigger is longer. Everything else is explained in the code's comments. Where in the code it says Don't touch, you can still touch (can't stop you) but you're bound to break it if you're not careful with changing those settings. Github release If you intend to use this for your community theme, you can get it here. Updates 12/25/15 The gift of improvement has been received! Netox005 [GitHub] helped to make this better, and not rely on a large pseudochild covering the entire footer, which means you can now change the colour of #player-controler .left and it'll work. 12/29/15 Removed #player-controller from constants section
